widgetId.label: widgetId
widgetId.notProvided: The widgetId field is required but was not provided.
widgetId.invalidType: The widgetId field does not contain valid data. This field must be a numeric value.

name.label: name
name.notProvided: The name field is required but was not provided.
name.invalidType: The name field does not contain valid data. This field must be a string value.
name.invalidLength: The name field is too long. This field must be no more than 50 bytes long.

widgetTypeId.label: widgetTypeId
widgetTypeId.notProvided: The widgetTypeId field is required but was not provided.
widgetTypeId.invalidType: The widgetTypeId field does not contain valid data. This field must be a numeric value.

isActive.notProvided: The isActive field is required but was not provided.
isActive.invalidType: The isActive field does not contain valid data. This field must be a numeric value.
